name: Dark Invasion VR: Doomsday
description:
A immersive scary and brutal VR horror ego shooter with quests and guns! Experience the beginning of the Dark Invasion and prepare to survive the first episode of "Dark Invasion VR: Doomsday".

Let us introduce you to "Dark Invasion VR: Doomsday", a horror VR shooter with a story driven campaign and quests. Fight your way through zombies, monsters, mutants and aliens with the help of melee weapons, handguns, shotguns and rifles. Time to get violent!

You play as John Beggart, a member of a reconstruction team that is working inside of an old bunker that survived the 2nd world war.
John shivers as he enters the bunker and does not know that his world would soon fall over. He remembers how Karen got lost in that place of forsaken tales. They just wanted to play hide and seek in here but he never found her again...
Nobody was prepared for what happened next, as the city gets overrun by zombies, mutants and aliens.
As the apocalypse begins our hero is inside of the old bunker, he needs to fight his way through the underground basement and takes full force of violence against the undead army of the dark invasion!
Take control of the situation and fight as John in VR and manage to fulfill your quest to get out of that forsaken place.

Quests, Zombies and guns!

-Fast paced action VR horror shooter
-Adventure elements and quests
-Fight with melee, ranged weapons or use grenades
-Story driven campaign
-Best horror 3D surround sound
-Dismemberment, gore and blood
-Free locomotion
-Room scaling
-Be the hero

We are plan to develop a episodic gameplay experience:

Episode 1: Bunker Doomsday is included into the current version. We plan to ad some more maps, quests, bosses and story elements into the next updates.
Episode 2: The Dead Peoples City. We plan and already work on a zombie overrun city with various locations, quests and story for the game.
Episode 3: The alien ship. We plan to ad episode 3 soon after we finished episode 2.

We plan, with later updates, to ad boss fights and midi boss fights to the game.

A violent and brutal VR ego shooter with story, zombies and quests is waiting for your audience.

We also plan to ad a bit later a skill system and customizable weapons, as well as many more improvements.
